Description: In this session, the speakers will present case examples of how spatial phenotyping and neighborhood analysis of tumor samples can give us breakthrough insights into treatment response and tumor biology. The presenters will also introduce a novel family of PhenoCode Panels that will simplify the workflow to study dozens of biomarker targets, including protein and RNA, across multiple sample types. And finally, the speakers will discuss how the discoveries from high plex spatial biology can be effectively moved over into translational and clinical research.
SearchResultBody: ESP03C. Spatial Biology Case Studies: Uncovering New Insights in Tumor Progression and Treatment Response
Title: Spatial Biology Case Studies: Uncovering New Insights in Tumor Progression and Treatment Response
